ProjectManagementSuccessStory.title: ProjectManagementSuccessStory
ProjectManagementSuccessStory.description: Represents a success story within the Project Management service, editable by an admin.

content.description: Detailed description of the success story.

imageUrl.description: URL of the image associated with the success story.

imageId.description: ID of the placeholder image used for the story.

category.description: Category of the project (e.g., Commercial, Residential).

datePublished.description: Date when the success story was published.

InvestmentProject.title: InvestmentProject
InvestmentProject.description: Represents an investment project displayed in the Investment Portfolio Viewer, editable by an admin.

id.description: Unique identifier for the investment project.

description.description: Detailed description of the investment project.

imageUrl.description: URL of the image representing the project.

startDate.description: Start date of the investment project.

endDate.description: End date of the investment project (if completed).

RealEstateListing.title: RealEstateListing
RealEstateListing.description: Represents a real estate listing, editable by an admin.

id.description: Unique identifier for the real estate listing.

imageUrl.description: URL of the image of the property.

PhilanthropicActivity.title: PhilanthropicActivity
PhilanthropicActivity.description: Represents a philanthropic activity or CSR initiative, editable by an admin.

id.description: Unique identifier for the philanthropic activity.

imageUrl.description: URL of the image associated with the activity.

date.description: Date when the activity took place.

user.title: user
user.description: Represents a user profile with an optional admin role.

isAdmin.description: Flag indicating if the user has admin privileges.

definition.description: Collection of project management success stories, editable by admins. Requires admin role check for all operations.
